text: The University of Dayton is a private, Roman Catholic university in Dayton, Ohio. The university has about 10,569 students. It was founded in 1850. The current president of the university is Eric Spina. ==Sports== The athletics teams of the university are called the Flyers. They have 16 varsity teams and they compete in the Atlantic 10 Conference and the Pioneer Football League for football. ==Other websites== *University of Dayton's Official website *Dayton Flyers' Official athletics website Category:Atlantic 10 Conference Category:Colleges and universities in Ohio Category:Dayton, Ohio Category:1850 establishments in Ohio
title: University of Dayton
